name: Lake of Darkness (pre alpha)
description:
Lake of Darkness is a visual novel psychological thriller

You are destined to die in three days. The game reacts to the choices you make and when finished will boast 20+ unique endings.  Will you hide from your fate? Spend your last few days with loved ones? Or try to break the cycle? 

This is a very early build there very well may be bugs, errors, or inconsistencies in design. Please give me feedback on literally anything you think could be changed or tweaked. The finished game will be significantly more polished.

-Developed in Ren'Py

-Atmospheric soundtrack with 12+ tracks

-Interesting pixel art environments

-Interactive dialogue and story

Remember if you stare too long into the abyss, the abyss stares back.
